name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobicip Parental Control with Screen Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a safe experience for your family using Mobicip's powerful parental control software with internet filter and screen time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mobicip is the most popular Internet filter and screen time parental control software for families to enjoy a safe and secure experience on Chromebook. 

With Mobicip, parents can:
- Filter the internet & block objectionable content
- Limit screen time 
- Monitor browsing history & online activity
- Use intuitive web portal or mobile app in Parent Mode, 24x7 on the go 

Take charge of your family’s digital experience! Enjoy quality family time with Mobicip, the perfect app for today’s “constantly connected” digital family. 

1. Set daily screen time limits on your child’s Chromebook to ensure healthy levels of digital immersion and manage bedtime and family time; or set recurring weekly screen time schedules.

2. Block websites, keep a watchful eye and draw a healthy boundary around the web. Stay on top of the usage/browsing history to spot online threats. Block pornography, gambling, violence and other inappropriate web content.

3. Instantly lock all devices for dinnertime or family-time.

4. Check your kids' browsing history on the go or set up weekly or daily reports to see a snapshot of their browsing trends.

5. Invite another parent to help manage and be informed of your kids' digital experience and ensure digital safety.

6. Keep track of the entire family's devices through an intuitive dashboard on the web or mobile 24x7 on the go.

FAMILY TIME

Family Time allows parents to lock down all the family devices instantly with a single touch for a certain period. Now family meals, bedtimes, family interactions and outdoor time can be completely device-free & without distractions! 

CROSS-PLATFORM PROTECTION

As your children and teens move across a wide variety of devices, Mobicip allows you to monitor and control all such devices irrespective of the platform or OS. 

“Mobicip is designed for the modern multi-device family, and its range of supported platforms is impressive” - PCMag. 

PRICING PLANS

Parents can choose from our annual pricing bundles: $49.99 for 5 devices, $89.99 for 10 devices, $124.99 for 15 devices, & $159.99 for 20 devices. As an introductory offer, the 5-device plan is offered at $39.99 per year.

HELP & SUPPORT 

Please visit our helpdesk (www.mobicip.com/support) for how-tos, videos, and articles. For additional assistance, contact us at support@mobicip.com.
